title: Mind your back
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Bruce Bennett
brief_description: The proper method of lifting heavy loads in coal mines. Demonstrates correct and incorrect methods in a variety of circumstrances, including raising, carrying and lowering a load; lifting, pushing and pulling a prop; lifting a gas cylinder, bag of cement, and 44 gallon drum; and team lifting.
